Name: ai_collaborative_brainstorming_agent
Title: AI-Powered Collaborative Brainstorming Agent
Experiment: Develop a conversational AI system that interacts with researchers to generate and refine research ideas. The agent should be fine-tuned on past research ideas, proposals, and reviewer feedback. Implement a reinforcement learning loop where researcher interactions improve the AIâ€™s ability to generate high-quality, innovative ideas. Evaluate by measuring novelty scores and researcher satisfaction compared to traditional brainstorming sessions.
